section.title: Load
section.para: The action will load properties from property files and store their values as test variables. The action will require a file resource either from class path or file system in order to read the property values.
We will have a look at the following example to get an idea about this action:
The action will load all available properties in the file load.properties and store them to the test case context as local variables. Existing variables may be overwritten.
